Request for Proposal

**Country of Origin**
-------------------

**Contracting Entity**
-------------------
Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission
280 Slater Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1P5S9, Canada

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------
Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**Procurement Method**
-------------------
 Competitive - Open Bidding

**Nature of Requirement**
--------------------
The Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission (CNSC) is seeking a proposal from qualified suppliers to conduct a research project that aims to systematically analyze methodologies and strategies for modeling the reliability of passive safety systems, focusing on their applications for Advanced Reactor Technologies.

**Scope of Work**
----------------
The successful bidder will conduct a comprehensive analysis of widely used methodologies and strategies for modeling the reliability of passive safety systems. The project will result in a report outlining best practices and recommendations for the assessment of passive safety systems.

**Duration of Contract**
-------------------
One (1) year commencing on the date of contract award.

------------------------

-------------------
In case of a discrepancy in the terms used in the English and French versions of this solicitation, the English version will take precedence. Canada retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Bids may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
